title: The Weeski Recipe
full_text:
The Weeski Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
Irish whiskey
1
ounce
Lillet Blanc
1
teaspoon
Cointreau
2
dashes
orange bitters
Lemon peel
, for garnish
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist thin strip of lemon peel above drink and use as garnish.
Special equipment
mixing glass, bar spoon, strainer
Whiskey
